content:

author: zhvyr
content:
if goerli is being "upgraded" to shapella as stated in the linked tweet is that same as goerli being deprecated?

https://twitter.com/terencechain/status/1631397911652372481?t=j5jbv5-7qLwG2L77bEwcSQ&s=19

author: abcoathup
content:
Shapella is the Shanghai (execution layer) + Capella (consensus layer) upgrade that includes withdrawals.  Sepolia testnet was upgraded this week, Goerli testnet is being upgraded on March 14 with mainnet being upgraded after that: https://blog.ethereum.org/2023/02/21/sepolia-shapella-announcement

HoleÅ¡ovice testnet is a replacement for Goerli testnet expected later this year, with permissionless staking.
https://github.com/eth-clients/holesky

Goerli testnet is deprecated as of January, with support for 12 months: https://github.com/eth-clients/goerli
